Dataset name: Actuaciones en materia de limpieza urbana
Dataset brief description: The database "Actuaciones en Materia de Limpieza Urbana (01/01/2017 - 30/06/2024)" records urban cleaning actions, including street sweeping, waste collection, and public space maintenance. It details dates, locations, types of actions, and responsible entities to track efforts in maintaining urban cleanliness during this period.
